name: PrintingModePositionVertical
description: Where the text should be printed relative to the object's Y position
macros: #[derive(PartialEq, Eq, Hash, Clone, Copy, Serialize, Deserialize)]

content.name: DesignedTop
content.description: Text should be anchored on the top. The top of the text being defined by the font's author as the "absolute top"

content.name: CalculatedTop
content.description: Text should be anchored on the top. The top of the text being measured at run time

content.name: TopLine
content.description: Text should be anchored on the top. The top of the text being defined by the font's author as the "top line"

content.name: CalculatedCentre
content.description: Text should be anchored on the centre. The centre of the text being measured at run time

content.name: CapitalCenter
content.description: Text should be anchored on the centre. The centre of the text being defined exactly 50% the height of a capital letter

content.name: CentreLine
content.description: Text should be anchored on the centre. The centre of the text being defined by the font's author as the "centre line"

content.name: DesignedBottom
content.description: Text should be anchored on the bottom. The top of the text being defined by the font's author as the "absolute bottom"

content.name: CalculatedBottom
content.description: Text should be anchored on the bottom. The bottom of the text being measured at run time

content.name: BottomLine
content.description: Text should be anchored on the bottom. The top of the text being defined by the font's author as the "bottom line"
